headers.title: Add a Node in Proxmox Cluster
headers.author: Seon Kim
headers.subject: Proxmox Features

data.text: Creating a cluster and grouping nodes in order to manage it in one interface is easy, useful, and convenient in variety of ways.
First, create a cluster in a server you want to use. If you want to have access to the cluster through multiple nodes you can configure that while configuring the others.
